flawed_nl_solution:
He increased his speed by 150*0.3=45 mph
So his new speed was 150+45=<<150+45=159>>159 mph
He increased it a further 10 mph so his new speed is 159+10=<<159+10=169>>169 mph
#### 169

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 195, not 159. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
